g.text: Confirm that the settlement window is closed and wait retry with timeout if not.
Initiate Settlement for these windows & Currency
Load currencies for windows using GET central-settlements/settlementWindows/{id}
Load settlement models using GET central-ledger/settlementModels
Determine minimum list of settlement models
the Settlement Bank, includes the settlement account
balances after all the transfers have been processed.
It is possible that these account balances are not
as expected. This would indicate that an
accounts that has not yet been captured in the
} ] # all participants that are involved in the settlement
For each participant get account balance
and are the correct type, and correct currency
Return warnings if there are discrepencies
Adjust settlment account according to settlement (funds Out)
Adjust settlment account according to settlement (funds In)
"errors": [{"type": "string", "message": "description", "errorInformation": {...}}] # errorInformation std fspiop error information object
